attributes.action: Free saliva drug testing kits to parents of teenagers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The growing menace of highly potent canabis is causing more and more teenagers to suffer from psychosis. It is freely available with little detterent. The suffering caused to families due to the mental illness it can lead to must be checked. If parents were given more advice and able to freely test their children it may prevent more admissions of teenagers to mental health wards and prevent the severe depression that can lead to suicide.
